text: "Dirty" Harry Moskowitz (born July 16, 1968) is an American mixed martial artist. He competed in the Super Heavyweight division. He won his last fight at XFC 1 - Xtreme Fight Club 1 against Johnnie Brown on November 14, 2003. ==Mixed martial arts record== |- | Win | align=center| 6-12 | Johnnie Brown | Decision | XFC 1: Xtreme
